message: Accept this and we can call it a day!
A chance to negotiate, let's see what you're willing to offer!
Too generous for you, Bob! I'm willing to give you $600,000, but I want $400,000 for myself.
Take it or leave it, Bob! I'm not getting any younger!
You're not getting any younger either, Alice! Let's make a deal!
Alright, deal! You've convinced me, Bob. Let's shake on it!
